pullrequest.title: Update dependencies based on feedback during package builds.

content.raw: Thanks @nuclearsandwich, changes to package.xml look good to me. It looks to me that the CMake code should be updated accordingly though. Feel free to either merge this as is and I'll open a follow-up PR or to push to this branch before merging
content.html: Thanks @nuclearsandwich, changes to package.xml look good to me. It looks to me that the CMake code should be updated accordingly though. Feel free to either merge this as is and I'll open a follow-up PR or to push to this branch before merging
